title: gccgo: reflect.Value.AssignableTo returns false-negatives.
body:
Steps to reproduce:
Compile and run the program at http://play.golang.org/p/JNLZ6a1O8l using gccgo.

What is the expected output?
[no output]

What do you see instead?
panic("reflect.TypeOf(struct { x int; y int
}{}).AssignableTo(reflect.TypeOf(reflect_assignability_test.TestUnnamedAssignableToNamed$localXY{}))
= false")

Which operating system are you using?
Ubuntu 12.04
